EmailTemplate.name: KM Feedback Ownership
EmailTemplate.subject: KM Feedback Item - {!KM_Feedback_Item__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!KM_Feedback_Item__c.OwnerFullName},
You have been assigned a new KM Feedback item.
To view the item click here : {!KM_Feedback_Item__c.Link}
Thank you,
S3 Leadership Team
